title: My apology to the GD community

embed.description: Tinypic™ is a photo and video sharing service that allows you to easily upload, link and share your images and videos on MySpace®, eBay®, blogs and message boards. No account required, upload your photos and videos today!

body:
If you are reading what's under the recent tab you would notice there are recent downvoted spammy discussions. I'm convinced it is someone and their friend(one of the mods) from the "Unofficial League of Legends discord" they're making such discussion topics in attempt to cause malice or maybe thinking they can antagonize me. 


_"New Champ Splash Art LEAKED!"_

_"Guise pls hep me i is are a week wee lil grill in ned of big stronk gder" _

avoid the unofficial discord, there are maybe 15-20 moderators there, and only 5-6 active users any given time. There are as many moderators as active users. They're friends to the active users obviously when it comes to friends they do not follow rules.
